item.description:
AMAZING UGANDAN CHILDREN'S CHOIR & DANCE PERFORMANCE - THIS IS ONE OF THE ONLY FREE PERFORMANCES ON THEIR US TOUR.

THEY WILL PEFORM ON THE LAWN IN FRONT OF THE GAZEBO IN FRONT OF THE NARRAGANSETT TOWERS.

THIS IS FREE... BUT DONATIONS WILL BE GRATEFULLY ACCEPTED - PLEASE DONATE WHAT YOU CAN... AS THESE BEAUTIFUL CHILDREN WILL SING & DANCE ONLY TO TAKE HOME WHATEVER PROFITS THEY RECEIVE TO THEIR POVERTY STRICKEN HOMES IN UGANDA.

THE PERFORMANCE STARTS AT 5PM AND RUNS THROUGH 730PM.

FOR MORE INFO - GO TO www.destinyafrica.org
item.how_to_find_us: LEFT OF GAZEBO WITH SIGN VISIBLE

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: AFRICAN CHILDREN'S CHOIR
